info.name: Bank Reconciliation API
info.description: Collection for testing Bank Reconciliation API endpoints

request.description: Login with username and password. Response includes app tokens and Xero tokens if connected.
Refresh access token using refresh token

Logs out the user by blacklisting the current access token, removing all refresh tokens, and clearing authentication cookies. The token will be invalidated and cannot be reused even if it hasn't expired.
Request password reset email
Reset password using token
Register a new user with email and password
Get current user profile
Get all users (requires superuser permissions)

item.name: Xero Integration
item.description: Xero OAuth and token management endpoints

request.description: Initiates Xero OAuth flow. Will redirect to Xero login page.
Refresh Xero access token when it's close to expiring

body.message: Your Xero session has expired. Please re-authenticate.

item.name: Xero Integration
item.description: Endpoints for Xero integration. NOTE: Initial authentication must be done through a web browser at http://localhost:8000/api/v1/xero/auth/login

request.description: Check if you're currently authenticated with Xero. Use this after completing browser authentication to verify your session status.

item.name: Login (Browser Only - Do Not Use in Postman)

request.description:
⚠️ DO NOT USE THIS IN POSTMAN ⚠️
This endpoint must be accessed through a web browser at:
http://localhost:8000/api/v1/xero/auth/login

The OAuth2 flow requires browser interaction and cannot be completed in Postman.
Refresh your Xero OAuth token when it expires. This will return a new access token that can be used for subsequent requests.
Log out from Xero by clearing the stored tokens and session data.
Get a list of all available Xero organizations/tenants

variable.description: ID of the tenant to set as active

request.description: Set the active Xero tenant for subsequent operations
Get the currently active Xero tenant

item.name: Bank Accounts
item.description: Bank account management related endpoints. Make sure to select an active tenant before using these endpoints.

request.description: Get a list of all active bank accounts for the current tenant

variable.description: ID of the bank account to set as active

request.description: Set the active bank account for transaction retrieval
Get information about the currently active bank account

item.name: Contacts
item.description: Contact management related endpoints. Make sure to select an active tenant before using these endpoints.

request.description: Get a list of all contacts for the current tenant

variable.description: The ID of the contact to retrieve

request.description: Get details of a specific contact by their ID

item.name: Invoices
item.description: Invoice management related endpoints. Make sure to select an active tenant before using these endpoints.

request.description: Get a list of all invoices for the current tenant

variable.description: The ID of the invoice to retrieve

request.description: Get details of a specific invoice by its ID
Create a new invoice for the current tenant

variable.description: The ID of the invoice to attach the file to

request.description: Upload a file attachment for a specific invoice

item.name: Organisation
item.description: Organisation management related endpoints. Make sure to select an active tenant before using these endpoints.

request.description: Get a list of all organisations for the current tenant

item.name: Scheduled Tasks
item.description: Endpoints for managing scheduled invoice processing

query.description: ID of the brain to process invoices with

request.description: Start the scheduled processing of Xero invoices. The schedule is configured through the application settings.
Stop the scheduled processing of Xero invoices
List all brains with pagination support

variable.description: ID of the brain to retrieve. Replace with an actual brain ID.

request.description: Get details of a specific brain by its ID. The brain ID can be set in the path variables of this request.
Create a new brain with the specified details
List all documents in a brain with optional filters and pagination

formdata.description: Brain ID to associate the file with

request.description: Upload a document to a specific brain

variable.description: ID of the file to retrieve

request.description: Get details of a specific file by its ID
Process text content through the brain API. The text can be either a JSON string or object. For invoices, include an Invoices array in the text.
Get paginated invoice transactions for a brain
Get paginated statement transactions for a brain
Get reconciliation data for a brain within a specified date range. The end_period parameter is optional and defaults to the current time if not provided.
Verify reconciled transactions by providing statement and invoice mappings
